detailedDescription:
*property market remains open for viewings & valuations in person or by virtual appointment*

Beautifully presented and elegantly appointed two double bedroom ground floor apartment with large private garden and allocated parking, set within a stunning period property in a sought after location close to the heart of Farnborough Village. The property provides a wealth of period charm, with high ceilings and large original style windows, yet offers bright and spacious accommodation, sympathetically modernised with stylish interiors and modern design throughout. Features include an impressive reception room with feature circular bay overlooking the garden, separate well equipped high gloss kitchen, modern bathroom, quality floor coverings, and gas central heating.

Accommodation comprises entrance hall leading into the bright and spacious reception room with feature circular bay, feature fireplace, wood effect flooring, and ample space for relaxing, entertaining and dining. The separate kitchen comprises a modern range of matching high gloss wall and base units with work surfaces incorporating inset sink unit and further space for appliances. There are two well sized double bedrooms, with attractive bay window to the inviting master, plus a stylish family bathroom with white three piece bath suite, separate shower unit, and elegant tiling.

To book a viewing instantly just visit our website or download our award-winning App.

Location

The property is conveniently located within easy access of shops, pubs and restaurants in nearby Farnborough Village, as well as the centre of Orpington, with a wider range of shops, bars and restaurants and leisure facilities including an Odeon cinema, the Walnuts leisure centre and useful supermarkets. Orpington station is within easy reach, providing excellent links into Central London, as well as regular bus routes connecting the surrounding area. The area is also well served by a number of excellent schools and lovely open spaces.

* A wealth of quality fixtures & fittings * approx 22'8 X 20'1 garage * landscaped front & rear gardens * semi-rural location * close to A range of amenities * much character *<br/><br/><b>Exterior</b><br/>Front Garden: Mainly laid to lawn with an insulated double wall with wrought iron border.
Apex LED lighting all around the property. Sensor lighting above gates and garage. Rock lights set in front garden. Lights on columns. Video entry system with cameras and several cameras around the property linking to internal screens.

detailedDescription:
Take a look at this stunning larger than usual two bedroom top floor flat situated in this ever popular location. Ideally located within this sought after village, providing excellent transport links to both Orpington and Bromley South mainline stations and a short drive from the M25. The village has a thriving high street with a pharmacy, cafe, convenience store and a post office, in addition to two pubs. The property is in catchment for excellent primary and secondary schools.

This modern well appointed home comprises a bright and airy lounge/dining room which is L shape bringing in the high quality fitted kitchen with quartz worktops and a breakfast bar with views across the village. It also benefits from two great size bedrooms with a built in wardrobe and storage space and a modern shower room which doubles as a utility room with built in space for a washer dryer. Additional benefits to this home are built in air conditioning and also electric remote operating rain sensitive windows so you don't have to worry if you leave them open and it rains.

Be sure to book your viewing today as this home wont be around for long.

detailedDescription:
Situated in a popular residential area close to a host of well regarded local schools we are delighted to offer for sale this character Edwardian four bedroom detached house that is offered for sale chain free. This property in our opinion has been beautifully well maintained by the current owners who have been careful to retain a host of the original features and being South facing the bright and spacious rooms enjoy an abundance of natural light. The house offers over 2200sq ft of living accommodation that briefly comprises a reception room, dining room, kitchen breakfast room and downstairs cloakroom on the ground floor with four equally well proportioned bedrooms one boasting an ensuite and a family bathroom on the first floor. The gardens are landscaped to suit entertaining while there is parking to to the front in addition to a large garage and we feel this impressive home will ideally suit the needs of any growing family.

detailedDescription:
A beautifully presented two bedroom top floor flat set within a popular purpose built low rise building within easy access of excellent transport links and amenities.

The property has been superbly decorated, offering light and spacious accommodation tastefully styled throughout. Further features including a generous reception room, well equipped fitted kitchen, modern bathroom and an outside lockup easily large enough for a bike.

Representing an excellent first time or investment purchase, the property further benefits from gas central heating, double glazing and ample storage.

Accommodation comprises bright entrance hall leading into the naturally bright and spacious open plan reception room with wide double glazed windows allowing for lots of natural light. The kitchen comprises a modern range of matching wall and base units with work surfaces and stylish tiling, incorporating inset sink unit, gas hob range cooker with overhead extractor and electric oven below and further fitted appliances. There are two well sized bedrooms, the master being the larger of the two with built-in storage, plus a sleek bathroom with modern white three piece suite and elegant tiling.

Viewings are highly recommended - Please click 'brochure link' to book instantly!

***Owing to Government guidelines and the safety of our clients and potential buyers we have amended the way we carry out open days which are currently on hold until further notice. Please arrive at every viewing with ppe and be respectful of social distancing. We endeavor to give everyone fair and ample time to view and would welcome a second viewing if you feel you need more time.***

Location

Haysleigh House is well located within several mainline stations including Norwood Junction, Anerley, Birkbeck and Elmers End which offer fast and frequent services into Central London along with access to frequent buses.

The property location offers multiple choice for High Streets and excellent shopping facilities along with pubs, cafes and restaurants.

The beautiful South Norwood Lakes and Betts Park are both within walking distance of this gorgeous property.

Lease Information

Lease Information: Expires February 2115

All interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries via a solicitor.

Service Charges

Service Charges: £1,156 per annum
Ground Rent: £10 per annum

All interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries via a solicitor.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. We therefore strongly advise you to make further enquiries before completing your purchase of the property to ensure you are happy with all the information provided.
